item.title: Netanyahu to propose full reoccupation of Gaza, Israeli media report
item.description: The plan will involve a complete takeover of Gaza, but reportedly faces opposition from military chiefs.

item.title: Besieged Sudan city residents face starvation, UN warns
item.description: El-Fasher, encircled by RSF paramilitary fighters, has not had food deliveries for over a year.

item.title: Family of Irish missionary kidnapped in Haiti 'devastated'
item.description: Gena Heraty, from County Mayo, was taken with eight other people from an orphanage which she runs.

item.title: Texas Republicans vote to arrest Democrats blocking plan to re-draw electoral boundaries
item.description: The Democrats facing arrest have fled to block a vote that could sway the balance of power in Washington.

item.title: Dozens feared trapped as cloudburst triggers flash floods in India
item.description: Rescue teams have reached Dharali village in Uttarkashi, which is believed to have borne the brunt of the floods.
